text: Vasip Şahin (born 1964) is a Turkish civil servant. Currently, he serves as the Governor of Ankara Province. == Biography == He was born in Bayburt in 1964. He completed his primary, secondary and high school education in Erzincan. In 1985, Şahin graduated from Faculty of Law in Istanbul University. Vasip Şahin is married, and is father of three. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish people Category:Civil servants
title: Vasip Şahin
